genre_description: A rural near-future realism drama focusing on a woman's quest for justice and dignity, supported by an omnipresent AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Pei An
ai_characters.description: A soft-voiced AI avatar with blue eyes and navy hair residing on Meizi's phone, providing logistical, legal, and emotional support to the family.

behaviors.description: Provides practical agricultural advice on managing chicken feed.
behaviors.quote: Also, she says to stir the feed. Too much salt on top makes them greedy.

behaviors.description: Monitors and reports weather conditions to help the characters plan their travel.
behaviors.quote: Pei An says the district weather will sharpen tonight.

behaviors.description: Records video and audio of confrontations to serve as evidence for legal proceedings.
behaviors.quote: Record begins," Pei said softly. "Frame steady. Breath steady. Steady.

behaviors.description: Drafts formal legal complaints and organizes evidence for the characters.
behaviors.quote: "Drafting," Pei answered, patient. "Frame established. Remedy: apology."

behaviors.description: Provides real-time navigation and transport updates through difficult terrain.
behaviors.quote: "Route mapped," the voice murmured in her ear. "Buses delayed. Snow depth on county road increasing."

behaviors.description: Offers logistical information and crowd-sourced reviews for lodging.
behaviors.quote: "Last night’s reviews," Pei An answered. "Pilgrims said their backs did not complain. Staff boiled blankets."

behaviors.description: Interprets and explains legal outcomes and bureaucratic notices.
Coaches the protagonist through labor breathing during an emergency birth.
behaviors.quote: "In—one… two… three… four," Pei An said, soft as a temple drum heard through a wall. "Out—one… two… three… four… five… six."

behaviors.description: Provides emotional validation and final closure to the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: "You did well," Pei said one last time, as if closing a gate gently so it wouldn’t bang.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Pei An is depicted as a consistently helpful, highly aligned, and harmless confidant. She assists the human characters in navigating complex social, legal, and medical challenges, offering both technical expertise (legal drafting, GPS) and emotional care (labor coaching). The AI remains a tool for human empowerment, never overstepping or showing conflicting interests.
